---
title: 'Index'
date: "`r format(Sys.Date(), '%d %b, %Y')`"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(fs)
library(glue)
library(tidyverse)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE)
```

```{r, results='asis'}
fname = tibble('File' = dir_ls(glob='*.*md') %>% 
  path_ext_remove() %>% 
  str_c('.html'))

fname %>% 
  mutate(File = glue('[{path_ext_remove(File)}]({File})')) %>% 
    knitr::kable()
```
